Strategic_Recommendation: For Cluster 0 (lower-demand days), average total daily servings are ≈ 22646 with ≈ 3298 students present. These days are dominated by **Lunch** demand. These are good candidates for slightly reduced batch sizes to control waste.

For Cluster 1 (high-demand days, often event-heavy), average total daily servings are ≈ 36875 with ≈ 4439 students present. These days are dominated by **Lunch** demand. Plan slightly higher production for core dishes and avoid under-preparation. Since this cluster is event-heavy, include at least one premium / special dish.

For Cluster 2 (lower-demand days, often vacation/holiday-like), average total daily servings are ≈ 8256 with ≈ 1606 students present. These days are dominated by **Lunch** demand. These are good candidates for slightly reduced batch sizes to control waste. Since this cluster is vacation-like, keep the menu simpler with fewer varieties.

For Cluster 3 (high-demand days), average total daily servings are ≈ 27893 with ≈ 3930 students present. These days are dominated by **Lunch** demand. Plan slightly higher production for core dishes and avoid under-preparation.
